entry.def: If you describe something as disordered, you mean it is untidy and is not neatly arranged.

example.ex: Moretti ran a hand through his disordered red hair.
example.tran: 莫雷蒂用手理了理他那一头凌乱的红发。
一堆杂乱的长满苔藓的树枝

entry.tran: (精神)失调的，错乱的，不正常的，有病的
entry.def: Someone who is mentally disordered or who has a disordered mind is mentally ill.

example.tran: 帮助患有心理障碍的罪犯的社会机构

example.ex: ...events that crystallized into a conspiracy in one disordered mind.
example.tran: 在精神不正常的人看来是一个阴谋的事件

means.word_mean: 1. thrown into a state of disarray or confusion;

sentences.sentence: "a confused mass of papers on the desk"
"a confused dream about the end of the world"
